headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Ralph Lauren (RL) Extending Its Team USA Olympic Uniform Partnership
summary: Ralph Lauren recently unveiled Team USA's Opening and Closing Ceremony uniforms for the Milano Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics, marking its 10th consecutive Games outfitting American athletes and launching a dedicated Team USA collection across select U.S. and Italian retail and online channels. This renewal of a long-running Olympic partnership expands Ralph Lauren's global visibility at a premier sporting event while reinforcing its premium brand positioning and connection with passionate...
